resources.string: Transcription from any medium onto the page of an Olivetti\-Underwood Lettera 32 typewriter.
We work exclusively in black ink
Upon request, we can work in longhand or printing (Pilot G\-2 07 pen)
Dictation our specialty \- in\-person or over the phone
Make an Appointment, or Stop By the Office \- Walk-Ins Welcome!
